mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AD_COMMENT ( AD_NO, ADC_NO, ID, AD_REG_DATE, AD_CONTENT, AD_LIKE ) VALUES ( #{AD_NO}, SEQ_AD_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ID}, SYSDATE, #{COM}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT AD_CONTENT FROM AD_COMMENT WHERE ID=#{ID} AND AD_NO=#{AD_NO}
SELECT AD_NO,ADC_NO,AC.ID,AD_CONTENT,AD_LIKE,AD_LIKE_ID,MEMBER_NO,NAME FROM AD_COMMENT AC,MEMBER M WHERE AC.ID=M.ID AND AC.ADC_NO=#{ADC_NO} AND AD_NO=#{AD_NO}

SELECT NAME, AD_NO, ADC_NO, ID, AD_CONTENT, AD_LIKE, AD_LIKE_ID, AL_GRADE, PROFILE_IMAGE, RNUM FROM (SELECT NAME, AD_NO, ADC_NO, ID, AD_CONTENT, AD_LIKE, AD_LIKE_ID, TO_CHAR(AL_GRADE,'0.0') AS AL_GRADE, PROFILE_IMAGE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT M.NAME,AC.AD_NO, AC.ADC_NO,AC.ID,AC.AD_CONTENT,AC.AD_LIKE,AC.AD_LIKE_ID,AL.AL_GRADE,PROFILE_IMAGE FROM AD_LIKE AL, AD_COMMENT AC ,MEMBER M WHERE AL.AD_LIKE_NO=AC.AD_NO AND AL.ID=AC.ID and AL.ID=M.ID AND AC.AD_NO=#{AD_NO} ORDER BY AD_LIKE DESC)ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
select count(*) as count from AD_COMMENT where AD_NO = ${AD_NO}
mapper.delete: delete AD_comment where AD_no=#{AD_NO} and ID=#{ID}
mapper.update: update AD_comment set AD_content=#{MCOM} where id=#{ID} and AD_no=${AD_NO}
